page.title: 12Thame Services 2
page.content:
Thame Post Office employs 15 postmen, 1 supervisor in the sorting office, 4 counter clerks, and 1 cleaner. Mr. Kinch is the postmaster of the Thame building, which covers about 4,700 addresses. In the district there are 23 postboxes, covering an area of 18 square miles.The Thame Post Office uses 6 vans and 15 bicycles.The van brings the mail twice a day to be sorted at the Post Office.C.P.M. is the Post Office's largest customer.
Thame Cottage Hospital was first opened in 1897, when Simmel Lacey paid 78 pounds for the land and 700 pounds for the hospital to be built.Today there are 19 beds and a casualty unit. Most of the patients are elderly. There are 6 people on duty in the morning, 4 in the afternoon and 2 at night.
